letter

Class Letter<C extends Content>

  • java.lang.Object
    • letter.Letter<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the content of the letter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Content
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PromissoryNote, SimpleLetter, SpecialLetter

    public abstract class Letter<C extends Content>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Content
    Letter which you can send, receive, send money or text
    Author:
    Meyer Hembert
